channel.title: [PI] Pk Highscores
channel.description:
I have no clue how to do this.
How do I get it to where on an interface it shows the top ten people with the most PK points. It's saved in their character file as "pk-points" I just don't know how to show it on the interface. Please help. And, I know this is simple, but I've had a rough day and don't want to think.

item.title: [PI] Pk Highscores
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

	public void resetRanks() {
		for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
			ranks[i] = 0;
			rankPpl[i] = "";
		}
}
	public void highscores() {
		getPA().sendFrame126("***** SERVER", 8144);  //Title
		getPA().sendFrame126("Top 10 PKERS", 8145);
		for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
			if(ranks[i] > 0) {
				getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Kills: " +ranks[i], 6402+i);
			}
		}
		getPA().showInterface(6308);
		flushOutStream();
		resetRanks();
	}

Work off that.

Read full topic
